pr_title: Add documentations for org level resources.

timeline.message: Add documentations for org level resources.

timeline.bodyText: Org level IAM permissions for org admins.
timeline.author: umairidris

timeline.bodyText: to enable collection of all possible audit logs.
timeline.author: umairidris
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,14 @@
+# This folder contains Terraform resources related to audit, which includes:
+# - Organization IAM Audit log configs (https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/audit),
+# - BigQuery log sink creation and configuration for short term log storage,
+# - Cloud Storage log sink creation and configuration for long term log storage,
+# - IAM bindings for log Auditors to view the logs.
+
 terraform {
   backend "gcs" {}
 }
 
+# IAM Audit log configs.

timeline.bodyText:
IAM permissions
also mention security reviewer permission on the org?
timeline.author: umairidris
